typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		Column_24 as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		Column_26 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(locate("Распределение по месяцам", Column_1)!=0,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(measurename, data)
ConditionalSplit1@data split(isNull(Column_1),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit2@(chanelNames, chandata)
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		measureName = Column_3,
		id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ConditionalSplit2@chandata filter(Column_1!="Итого") ~> Filtered
Filtered select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7,
		Column_8,
		Column_9,
		Column_10,
		Column_11,
		Column_12,
		Column_13,
		Column_14,
		Column_15,
		Column_16,
		Column_17,
		Column_18,
		Column_19,
		Column_20,
		Column_21,
		Column_22,
		Column_23,
		Column_24,
		Column_25,
		Column_26
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 unpivot(output(
		channel as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	ungroupBy(Column_1),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Unpivot1
Select3 unpivot(output(
		id as string,
		name as string
	),
	ungroupBy(Column_1),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot2
ConditionalSplit2@chanelNames select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7,
		Column_8,
		Column_9,
		Column_10,
		Column_11,
		Column_12,
		Column_13,
		Column_14,
		Column_15,
		Column_16,
		Column_17,
		Column_18,
		Column_19,
		Column_20,
		Column_21,
		Column_22,
		Column_23,
		Column_24,
		Column_25,
		Column_26
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Unpivot1, Unpivot2 join(channel == id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		name,
		month = Unpivot1@Column_1,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 derive(measure_id = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionalSplit1@measurename derive(id = 1) ~> DerivedColumn2
Select1, DerivedColumn1 join(id == measure_id,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		stationName = name,
		month,
		measureName,
		Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select5 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
